title: Maldives OUTRIGGER Overwater Villa with Roundtrip International Flights, Daily Dining & Drinks + Seaplane Transfers
description:
With flights included, it's now even easier to experience the iconic OUTRIGGER barefoot luxury you love in the world’s most spectacular destination: surrounded by lush gardens, warm sands and the brilliant-blue South Ari Atoll. Step beyond your sun-washed overwater villa and embrace your escape - drift away into holistic bliss at the ocean-perched Navasana Spa, sample lobster and grilled sirloin at Moodhu Grill or savour teppanyaki thrills at Koto.

Love the water? The resort’s PADI centre and extraordinary house reef - brimming with manta rays, countless shimmering schools of marine life and the occasional whale shark - offer some of the best underwater experiences in the archipelago. Return from underwater adventures to artisanal, island-made ice cream and superb coffee at Kofee ‘n Chill, breezy poolside cocktails and light bites at Edgewater or moonlit modern fine dining at the exquisite Koto, magically set at the island’s highest point.
offer_address: Maafushivaru Island, South Ari Atoll 00130, Maldives

title: Maldives OUTRIGGER Overwater Villas with Daily Breakfast, Daily Lunch & Dinner with Free-Flow Drinks & Seaplane Transfers
description:
It’s the iconic OUTRIGGER barefoot luxury you love in the world’s most spectacular destination: surrounded by lush gardens, warm sands and the brilliant-blue South Ari Atoll. When you're not relaxing on your sun-washed overwater villa, drift into bliss at the ocean-perched Navasana Spa, sample lobster and grilled sirloin at Moodhu Grill or savour teppanyaki thrills at Koto.

The resort’s PADI dive centre and house reef - brimming with manta rays, shimmering schools of marine life and the occasional whale shark - offer some of the best underwater experiences in the archipelago. Return from underwater adventures to artisanal, island-made ice cream and superb coffee at Kofee ‘n Chill or breezy poolside cocktails and light bites at Edgewater.

Enjoy a complimentary sunset cruise to witness the tapestry of colours as the sun dips below the horizon. After, you may choose to take the luxury up a notch with moonlit modern fine dining at the exquisite Art-I-San, magically set at the highest point on the island, or a personalised dining experience on the golden-hued shore.
offer_address: Maafushivaru Island, South Ari Atoll 00130, Maldives

title: Maldives All-Inclusive Overwater Villas with Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks & Roundtrip Seaplane Transfers
description:
Barefoot luxury meets untamed ocean magic at this five-star island retreat, nestled in the heart of the South Ari Atoll. Barceló Whale Lagoon Maldives embraces crystal waters and flaunts incredible sunsets that paint the sky in impossible colours. Here, time slows to island rhythm while luxury touches wrap around you like a warm tropical breeze.

Dive into pure bliss at the twin infinity pools that melt seamlessly into endless horizons, then embark on a culinary odyssey that'll make your soul sing, from exquisite fine dining at Aqua Restaurant to globe-trotting flavours at Sea Salt, where Middle Eastern spices dance with South American fire. Finally, drift to the enchanting Magical Pool Bar for sunrise snacks and sunset cocktails.

This paradise is surrounded by an underwater wonderland that hosts the ocean's most magnificent creatures, including majestic whale sharks and graceful manta rays. Some of the world's best snorkelling reveals coral gardens teeming with tropical fish and clear waters invite you to swim alongside nature's most spectacular marine ballet.
offer_address: Bodufinolhu Island, Fenfushi, South Ari Atoll, 20209, Maldives

vendor_name: Centara Grand Island Resort & Spa Maldives
title: Maldives Private Island Villas on the South Ari Atoll with Award-Winning House Reef
description:
Find your slice of paradise at this private island oasis in the Maldives, just a short 25-minute seaplane flight from Malé. This spectacular villa-only retreat is surrounded by the dazzling waters of the South Ari Atoll, with exceptional snorkelling and diving opportunities in abundance.

Fall in love with the resort’s timber overwater walkways, sweeping golden sands and world-class facilities, including six restaurants and bars, wellness sanctuary SPA Cenvaree, an overwater fitness centre and Camp Safari kids' club.
location_description: Centara Grand Island Resort & Spa Maldives
offer_address: Centara Grand Island, South Ari Atoll, 20217, Maldives
